column4: hmm ... is there any "need to have" programs ? =P ... tried gDesklets, screenlets and google apps out, but now i need to get something else =P
got any more nice little programs that "i" just gotta have ?
depends what you do on your pc
well ... uhm ... a little bit of this, and a little bit of that ... i cant be more precise .... hehe
tilda was actually pretty nice, dropdown terminals is allways "nifty" =P
yeah, beats having to hunt for terminal amongst your windows, the kde equiv is yakuake
what do you use your system for to what must have apps you should get

do you happen to know if  there is any proggys similar to the desklets and screenlets ? ... been looking for ages, but i cant seem to find one that "sticks" ... or perhaps something i or anyone for that matter cant live without =P
you can make screenlets reappear by adding a script to run the python code for each screenlet you want

mostly converting videos and/or burning some dvd:s .... running tovid GUI now since brasero don't want to "play" with me ... hmmmm ... some surfing and some games .... doing different things each day ^^ ... ah, yup the screenlets reappearing thingy, i got that one figured out, but thx anyways m8 =P
really ? ... installed it the other day, but i havnt tried it out yet
its what i use, otherwise i cant suggest anything...snow plugin for compiz is festive ;)
haha, gotta try that one, gotten bored with the "water" effect
is there a way of making tilda autostart ? ... tried to add it in sessions, but it did not work =/
haha, i just figured out why i could'nt get Tilda to autostart =P .... a simple typo, had written "Tilda" instead of "tilda" =P
